item.description: Let's meet in front of "Jamin Jarva" - formally Carberry's on the corner of Mass Ave and Pleasant St. (Route 60). Parking is available on both streets or in the large parking lot on Mystic Ave (across from the Minute Man Trail). We'll walk through the historic district, take a short walk through Menotomy Rocks and continue on to Lexington. Afterwards if people are interested we can grab a bite to eat and/or drink.
item.name: Arlington /Lexington Walk
